description: Answer a data question by generating and executing SQL against the correct database.
examples: show me statements count by status in July
heaviest workflows in the last 7 days
total transactions per channel yesterday
in what workflow is table X used as source
which sessions failed for workflow Y in past week
list all tables used by workflow Z
show distinct workflows ran in last 48 hours

description: Compare two structured files (CSV, Excel, JSON) and highlight differences.
examples: diff file A and file B by order_id
show changes between two reports
comapre these two datasets for differences
do full comparison of file A and file B
generate a delta report between these two files

description: Send a report, chart, or query result via email to specified recipients.
examples: email me the results
send this report to finance team
mail the output as attachment

description: Create a new Jira issue to track problems found in reports or comparisons.
examples: open a jira bug for mismatched data
create issue if differences found
log this as task in jira

description: Create a simple chart (line, bar) from query results or comparison data.
examples: plot workflow runtimes over the last week
show me a graph of daily totals
visualize this data
